title: Stage Lv9-P5-S27
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: What we need is decisive action.
What we must avoid is complacency.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 우리에게 필요한 것은 결단력 있는 행동입니다.
sentences.en: What we need is decisive action.
What we must avoid is complacency.
What matters most is customer satisfaction.
What we strive for is excellence.
What we need right now is patience.
What we learned is the importance of teamwork.

sentences.kr: 진정으로 중요한 것은 결과가 아니라 과정입니다.
sentences.en: What truly matters is not the result but the process.

sentences.kr: 우리가 원하는 것은 지속 가능한 성장입니다.
sentences.en: What we want is sustainable growth.
